Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires the Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation to establish standards for the closing of trails on the Empire state trail
Summary: Requires the Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation to establish standards for the closing of segments of trails on the Empire state trail, and provide notice of such closings to the public.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง3.27, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing standards for trail closures on the Empire state trail
